content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Lai Ching-te

This is a list of international presidential trips made by Lai Ching-te, the president of the Republic of China.
Summary
The number of visits per country where he has travelled are:
* One visit to: Palau, Marshall Islands, Tuvalu.
* Two visits to: the United States.
2024
